text: To be honest, if it wasn't for 4chan I would've never known the sequel was released. Just share the game with people you know, people are bound to play it someday
author: kaboissonneault

text: The first game was my 5th favorite of 2012, and this one was my 4th of 2014. Suffice to say I'm a big fan of this series which brings old school RPG gameplay in a refreshing way. I love how they went with an open world filled with dungeons instead of one giant dungeon, a much appreciated step up from the prequel. I still think the battle system could be better implemented, but the atmosphere and puzzles are top notch. One particular sequence in a desert was especially memorable, I'm sure those who played it know what I'm refering to!
author: SupraDarky
